project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement function to read the text file and preprocess the text (remove punctuation, convert to lowercase)
Implement function to count the frequency of each word
Implement function to find the top 10 most common words
Implement CLI to display the results in the terminal
Write tests for each of the implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
